title: the new assassins

embed.description: This year was Riot's 10-year anniversary-the perfect time to look back on our wins and losses, and to challenge ourselves to keep getting better at serving players.

body: is it just me or do these new updates seem broken AF, like i all ready get deleted by good assassins, why make them even more op. rengar's w for example like a heal was enough used right it would save you in a fight but now that it removes all cc and prevents them for a short time seems stupid, we have a champ that can do that his name is olaf and its his god damn ULT , plus you can buy an item that removes cc so like this up date just makes him easier to play and get out. then talon with is wall vault thing like are  you serious REALLY?!?!
